content.raw:
@vinayak_jagtap we run this script [~/code/cloudsim-sim/src_commands/fc_run_team_docker.bash](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/cloudsim-sim/src/955891b7107c0089586f5e42b6c7b9b10cc8e82b/src_commands/fc_run_team_docker.bash) on the field computer host machine to launch your container, and pass in the `-e ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311` argument to `docker run`.

@dan77062 you don't need to install openvpn inside the docker container. It's already installed and run on the field computer host machine, and the docker container has access to the VPN network interface.
content.html:
@vinayak_jagtap we run this script ~/code/cloudsim-sim/src_commands/fc_run_team_docker.bash on the field computer host machine to launch your container, and pass in the -e ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311 argument to docker run.

@dan77062 you don't need to install openvpn inside the docker container. It's already installed and run on the field computer host machine, and the docker container has access to the VPN network interface.
